display.title: Cozy
description: Decorative blocks like &&3Bookshelves&&r can help fill a house's interior, but most indoor furniture &&disn't crafted&&r.
Instead, facsimiles are created by arranging &&eunrelated blocks&&r into familiar-looking shapes.

&&dClosets, dressers, and cabinets&&r can all be created by placing &&3Doors&&r and &&eTrapdoors&&r in front of functional blocks like &&3Chests&&r and &&eBarrels&&r or decorative blocks like &&3Stairs&&r and &&3Bookshelves&&r.&&l

&&eStairs&&r with &&3Signs&&r on either side can serve as &&dArmchairs&&r, especially when facing &&dTables&&r made of &&3Inverted Stairs&&r, &&3Floating Slabs&&r, or &&3Fences&&r with &&3Pressure Plates&&r on top.

&&dFireplaces&&r can be made of non-flammable blocks with &&eNetherrack&&r as the flammable base. Fire can spread up to &&dtwo blocks away, and four blocks up&&r. If space is limited, use &&eSoul Soil&&r instead for a &&dnon-spreading blue flame&&r.
&&3Blue Ice&&r can serve as water in &&dbathtubs and aquariums&&r without needing to be enclosed.
